virtualTable.name: ways_lit
virtualTable.sql: WITH variables AS ( SELECT select_from_variable_container('categories_highway_lit_yes') AS categories_highway_lit_yes, select_from_variable_container('categories_highway_lit_no') AS categories_highway_lit_no, select_from_variable_container('categories_surface_lit_no') AS categories_surface_lit_no, select_from_variable_container('excluded_class_id_walking') AS excluded_class_id_walking, select_from_variable_container('categories_no_foot') AS categories_no_foot, select_from_variable_container('categories_sidewalk_no_foot') AS categories_sidewalk_no_foot ) SELECT lit, highway, surface, w.geom, CASE WHEN lit IN ('yes','Yes') OR (lit IS NULL AND highway IN (SELECT UNNEST(categories_highway_lit_yes) FROM variables)) THEN 'yes' WHEN lit IN ('no','No') OR (lit IS NULL AND (highway IN (SELECT UNNEST(categories_highway_lit_no) FROM variables) OR surface IN (SELECT UNNEST(categories_surface_lit_no) FROM variables)) ) THEN 'no' ELSE 'unclassified' END AS lit_classified FROM ways w, study_area s WHERE class_id::text NOT IN (SELECT UNNEST(excluded_class_id_walking) FROM variables) AND (foot IS NULL OR foot NOT IN (SELECT UNNEST(categories_no_foot) FROM variables)) AND (sidewalk IS NULL OR sidewalk NOT IN (SELECT UNNEST(categories_sidewalk_no_foot) FROM variables)) AND ST_Intersects(s.geom,w.geom)
